text: Manageable risks"? Oh, really? It's easy to say that when you're not the one on the front lines. The Kremlin's silence on Iran's attack is deafening. How can we trust Russia's intentions when they won't even acknowledge a warning? Meanwhile, Russians are closing in on their battlefield target with no signs of slowing down. Ukraine needs more than just "military and budget support" from the US. They need action, not empty words.
